meanings.definition: To draw by appealing to the emotions or senses.
meanings.sent1: The colorful flowers attract bees to the garden.
meanings.sent2: The sweet smell of the bakery attracts customers.
meanings.sent3: The funny clown tried to attract attention by juggling.
meanings.sent4: Her positive energy seemed to attract good luck like a magnet.
meanings.sent5: The shiny object was so attractive that it seemed to pull people towards it.

meanings.definition: To cause to approach or adhere.
meanings.sent1: The magnet attracted the metal paperclips on the desk.
meanings.sent2: The sticky tape can attract dust particles easily.
meanings.sent3: The spilled juice seemed to attract ants in no time.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness attracted people to her like a warm fire on a cold night.
meanings.sent5: The strong gravitational pull of the planet attracted nearby asteroids towards it.
